tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists.

path.description: The path of the directory to create or ensure exists.

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: Get a recursive tree view of files and directories as a JSON structure.

path.description: The path to the directory to list.

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Make line-based edits to a text file.

edits.description: List of edits to apply to the file.

path.description: The path of the file to edit.

dryRun.description: (Optional) Preview changes using git-style diff format.

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory.

path.description: The path of the file or directory to get information about.

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access. Use this to understand which directories are available before trying to access files.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes

path.description: The path of the directory to list.

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename files and directories.

source.description: The source path of the file or directory to move.

destination.description: The destination path where the file or directory should be moved.

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the complete contents of a file from the file system.

path.description: The path of the file to read.

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously.

paths.description: List of file paths to read.

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern.

path.description: The starting path for the search.

pattern.description: The pattern to match file and directory names.

excludePatterns.description: (Optional) List of patterns to exclude from the search.

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Create a new file or completely overwrite an existing file with new content.

path.description: The path of the file to write.

content.description: The content to write to the file.
